Name: Cider Apple Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: As the name suggests, rich cider flavours with a sharp finish.
History: Created in 1998 by Jamie Terrell at Lab, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Cider Apple Cocktail contains 207 calories
